Table: companies
Columns: company_id (INTEGER), name (TEXT), sector (TEXT), headquarters (TEXT), founded (INTEGER), revenue_musd (REAL)

Table: deals
Columns: deal_id (INTEGER), company_id (INTEGER), deal_type (TEXT), value_musd (REAL), date (TEXT), advisor (TEXT)

Table: sectors
Columns: sector_id (INTEGER), sector_name (TEXT), avg_valuation_multiple (INTEGER), market_growth_pct (REAL)
